channel.title: Enviormental Variables
channel.description:
I recently reformatted my computer...
I would greatly appreciate if someone could post the enviormental variable so i can complie jave because i dont know where to find them...

item.title: Enviormental Variables
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I was just about to make a thread about this, although hold on one sec, Im gonna go search google.

I searched google, but nothing seems to be correct. Does anyone have swift’s tutorial still? It was good.[br][size=1]Posted at: March 29, 2006, 05:26:49 pm[/size][hr]Got it:

Download jdk and jre

Right click my computer, go to the advanced tab, click on the envirnment values(or something like that), double click on “path” and add a semicolon( to it. Add your jdk bin to the end of it, if your using c as your hard drive it should be C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06in
Now go compile aryan and run it.

Read full topic
